name: Lucy's Forest
description:
Lucy's Forest

-----------------------------------------

Description

When three friends decide to have a relaxing night in a forest, they didn't expect to be attack by a mysterious force that separated them against their will.

Now you control Lucy, a nervous girl who's not only trying to search her friends but also to survive the ridiculous and sinister presence of this place.

-----------------------------------------

Controls
  • Arrow keys and W, A, S, D - move around.
  • Z - Interact with objects and people.

-----------------------------------------

Team

Joao Cruz

Helene M. Siebenschock

Jorge Baldeon
